options.name: MongoDB Connection String
options.description: Your MongoDB connection string.  If you are connecting using SCRAM authentication via a username and password, please provide those values through the `MongoDB Username` and `MongoDB Password` options.  NOTE: The integration must be restarted if you modify this option.

options.name: MongoDB Username
options.description: Your MongoDB username.  Integration must be restarted if you modify this option.

options.name: MongoDB Password
options.description: Password for the provided MongoDB Username.  Integration must be restarted if you modify this option.

options.name: MongoDB Database to Search
options.description: The MongoDB database to search.  Integration must be restarted if you modify this option.

options.name: MongoDB Collection to Search
options.description: The MongoDB collection to search. Integration must be restarted if you modify this option

options.name: Search Filter
options.description: The search filter to execute.  Accepts the same filters as Mongo Compass.  You can substitute the entity value using `{{entity}}`.

options.name: Document Title Field
options.description: The name of the document field that you would like to use as your title in the details block in the integration's template. Option must be set to "User can view only" or "User can view and edit".

options.name: Document Title Icon
options.description: The name of the font awesome icon you would like to set.  You can choose from here https://fontawesome.com/icons?d=gallery&s=solid.  Option must be set to "User can view only" or "User can view and edit".

options.name: Summary Fields
options.description: Comma delimited list of fields to include as part of the summary (no spaces between commas).  These fields must be returned by your search query and are case sensitive.  You can specify nested fields using JSON dot notation.

options.name: Include Field Name in Summary
options.description: If checked, field names will be included as part of the summary fields.

options.name: Enable Document Updating
options.description: If checked, the document fields that are strings can be updated from the Overlay Window. This options must be set to "User can view only" or "User can view and edit"

options.name: Addable String Fields
options.description: Comma delimited list of fields that can be added to a returned document through the Overlay Window.  This option must be set to "User can view only" or "User can view and edit".  All fields will be added as string values.  The field is case sensitive.
